extendedInfo.description: A Companion App for the Learn To Swim e-book.Learn how to teach your child to swim with Benjamin Roberts, an experienced Swimming Teacher, Life Guard and School Teacher who understands fully how much parents enjoy the challenges associated with teaching their own children how to swim.

reviews.title: Best ive come across
reviews.comment: A very well thought through little app. Handy hints and tips that really do work. Would recommend and already have
reviews.author: Mathew Thomas

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: A wonderful app which really helped me to teach my son how to swim. Gave me the confidence to teach him, and now he loves swimming as much as I do
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: My 6 year old daughter has always been nervous in the water. A friend recommended this App to me and I found it easy to follow and the ideas and tips helped her to gain the confidence needed. She loves our trips to the pool now! It was also great to be able to email the free certificates to myself when she conquered each step. She even took them to school for \'show and tell\'! I would highly recommend and love the fact that it was free. Going to buy the book next once I can find the time to get regular pool sessions in, role on the summer!
reviews.author: Danielle Roberts

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: This app has given me the confidence to teach my nervous 4 year old to swim. He is now very keen to try the  techniques and games which makes things a lot easier. The certificates are a wonderful idea too,  to keep my child motivated and eager to learn!  I would definitely recommend this app.
reviews.author: Sally Davies

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.comment: Impressive and useful app. The writer has a different approach focussing on the basic skills that I had been over looking. Nice to have free certificates to.
reviews.author: A Google User
